name: Tiny Adventure (mad_girl)
description:
Hello, everyone! Welcome to my very first game made in Unity. I hope you'll like it.

My platformer consists of 4 simple levels and the fight with Shadow Monster. You will be playing as a tiny hero, who explores the world, fights snails and piranha plants, collects coins (although they are useless in this game, made them just for practice). 

If you enjoyed my tiny adventure, I would be glad to get your feedback and donations would be appreciated =) Your donations will help me to develop my skills and make other more interesting and more sophisticated games.

Thank you for visiting this page and hope you find my platformer game interesting and fun.

Credits:

Player - Free Tiny Hero Sprites Pixel Art from Craftpix.net - https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-tiny-hero-sprites-pixel-art

Tiles and background - Seasonal Tilesets by GrafxKid - https://grafxkid.itch.io/seasonal-tilesets

Coins https://laredgames.itch.io/gems-coins-free

Enemies - SunnyLand Enemies Pack https://ansimuz.itch.io/sunnyland-enemies-extended-pack

Boss - Undead Executioner - https://darkpixel-kronovi.itch.io/undead-executioner

Background music - https://opengameart.org/content/leap-8bit

Hero firing SFX - https://opengameart.org/content/huh

Enemy Dying Pop SFX - https://opengameart.org/content/bubbles-pop
